io.sphere.sdk.categories

Interface CategoryTree


  • public interface CategoryTree
    All categories in the project, represented as an in-memory tree.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Optional<Category> findById(java.lang.String id)
      Finds a category by id.
      java.util.Optional<Category> findBySlug(java.util.Locale locale, java.lang.String slug)
      Finds a category by the slug and a specific locale.
      java.util.List<Category> getAllAsFlatList()
      All categories as a flat list.
      java.util.List<Category> getRoots()
      Root categories (the ones that have no parent).
      static CategoryTree of(java.util.List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatListWithoutChildrenSettings)
      Creates a category tree from a flat list of categories.

      • of

        static CategoryTree of(java.util.List<Category> allCategoriesAsFlatListWithoutChildrenSettings)
        Creates a category tree from a flat list of categories.
        Parameters:
        allCategoriesAsFlatListWithoutChildrenSettings - all categories as flat list, element.getChildren() must result in an empty list.
        Returns:
        the created category tree.
